content: **pattern is available for free** **these quick cozy simple mitts feature optional contrast garter stitch trim and an offset thumb gusset ** **you will need ** - 30 to 60 grams total depending on size made of worsted or aran weight yarn smaller sizes can be made from fingering or sport weight yarn larger sizes can be made from bulky weight yarn - a stitch marker for beginning of round maybe also 2 to mark where increases go - a scrap of waste yarn for holding thumb stitches - yarn needle or crochet hook for weaving in ends **mitt sizes/ needles needed as follows ** - dpns or 9 circular needle or circ with long enough cable to do magic loop or size to obtain gauge - teen/adult worsted/aran us6-7/4 0-4 5mm for gauge of 6st/8 row to 1 /2 5cm - xlarge adult bulky us9/5 5mm for gauge of 5st/7 row to 1 /2 5cm - child sport us4/3 5mm for gauge of 8st/10 row to 1 /2 5cm - baby/toddler fingering us2/2 5mm for gauge of 9st/11 row to 1 /2 5cm
